description: ff. 179. 176 x 132; 120 x 90 mm. 19 lin. Ṣafar 987, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Dinūsharī (cf. Muḥarram Ill, 53-56). Brockelmann, GAL, I, 442 (commentary β); SI, 612. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى وصل من انقطع الىه

title: Fatḥ al-Bāqī bi-sharḥ Alfīyat al-ʻIrāqī.

subject: ʻIrāqī, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1325-1404—Alfīyat al-ʻIrāqī.
